actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Environment and Public Works.
Senate Committee on Environment and Public Works discharged by Unanimous Consent.
Passed Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.

official_title: A bill to designate the Federal Building to be constructed in Lakeland, Florida, as the "Lawton Chiles, Jr., Federal Building".

summary.text: Designates the Federal building to be constructed in Lakeland, Florida, which will replace the existing Federal building, as the Lawton Chiles, Jr., Federal Building.

titles.title: A bill to designate the Federal Building to be constructed in Lakeland, Florida, as the "Lawton Chiles, Jr., Federal Building".
